Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Strong expression in the tongue and bone marrow. Low expression in the esophagus, trachea, lung, brain and ovary. Expressed in the ovarian stroma, but not in the ovarian follicles. PTM
